flowthread_desc: This extension provides a thread-like commenting system
log-description-comments: This page shows administrative activities related to comments.
logentry-comments-erase: $1 permantly deleted a comment by $4 from $3, along with its $5 follow-ups.
logentry-comments-markchecked: $1 marked a comment by $4 in $3 as checked.
flowthreadimport-skipped: * $2 comments skipped for page [[:$1]], as comments with duplicate id already exists
flowthreadimport-failed: * Title [[:$1]] skipped as it does not exist, $2 comments not imported
flowthreadcontrol-disable-reason-dropdow:
** User prefer not to have comments on user page
* Common reasons
** Excessive vandalism
**Excessive spamming
flowthreadcontrol-optout: Opt-out comments on my user page
flowthreadcontrol-disable-success: Comments on page $1 has been turned off.
flowthreadcontrol-allow-optin: Allow owner of this user page to opt-in
flowthreadcontrol-enable-success: Comments on page $1 has been turned on.
flowthreadcontrol-showlog: The comment administration history of this page is reproduced below for reference.
flowthread-ui-cantpost: You do not have right to post. Please check site's policy about commenting.
flowthread-ui-useroptout: Comments are disabled upon user request. Please go to discussion page instead.
flowthread-ui-disabled: Comments are disabled on this page.
echo-pref-tooltip-flowthread: Notify me when my comment is replyed.
notification-header-flowthread_mention: $1 mentioned {{GENDER:$4|you}} in {{GENDER:$2|his|her|his or her}} post on '''$3'''.
notification-header-flowthread_spam: {{GENDER:$4|Your}} comment on '''$3''' was marked as spam automatically.
flowthread-blacklist:
# Texts in this list will be blocked when posted as comment. # Syntax is as follows: #* Everything from a "#" character to the end of the line is a comment #* Every non-blank line is a regex fragment matching texts #

 #
apihelp-flowthread-param-type: Type of action to take. (Must be one of list, like, dislike, report, delete, recover, erase, markchecked or post)
apihelp-flowthread-param-pageid: ID of the page to comment on (type = post), or to list comment (type = list). Required when type is post and list.
apihelp-flowthread-param-postid: ID of the post to act on (type = like, dislike, report, delete, recover, erase, markchecked), or to reply (type = post). Required in the former case.
apihelp-flowthread-param-content: Content of the comment to post. Required when type is post.
apihelp-flowthread-param-wikitext: Specify whether the content should be regarded as wikitext.
apihelp-flowthread-param-limit: Number of posts to list. Can be set to 'max' to fetch all posts of a page.
apihelp-flowthread-example-1: List all comments posted on the page with ID of 1.
apihelp-flowthread-example-2: Post a comment on the page with ID of 1.
apihelp-flowthread-example-3: Reply a comment on the page with ID of 1.
apierror-nosuchpostid: There is no post with ID $1.
